articles.title: 'We can't trust America!' Nigel Farage voices concerns over Joe Biden presidency - Daily Express
articles.description: NIGEL FARAGE has said the UK cannot 'trust America' after Joe Biden pulled US troops out of Afghanistan without consulting with Nato allies.
